add_ons.name: exchange_example
add_ons.desc: This is an example Add-On for vs-exchange. It contains a README.md file to provide a brief description of the Add-On, as well as a list of the Project, Package, Pipeline, Task, Canvas, and Registry documents included in the Add-On. Please use this as a guideline for how to structure a new Add-On that you wish to submit to the exchange.
